name: Dukes of War: A unique turn-based strategy game (Canceled)
blurb: Reviving the gaming fun of turn-based strategy classics in a exciting new experience on iOS and Android!

rewards.reward:
- - - - - - - BACKER'S Edition - - - - - - - 
==============================
THANK YOU FOR SUPPORTING DUKES OF WAR! Your name will be displayed in a special "Backer's List" within the game ==============================
Est. other currencies:$1,6; €1,2

- - - - - - - NOVICE Edition - - - - - - -      
==============================
Get the full Game on iOS or ANDROID 
+ Get access to the Dukes Of War Forum including the NOVICE Forum Badge 
+ All above tier rewards
==============================
Est. other currencies: $8; €6

- - - - - - - SQUIRE Edition - - - - - - - ==============================
Get early access to the BETA Version + 1 special hand drawn Wallpaper by Jakob + SQUIRE Forum Badge + All above tier rewards
==============================
Est. other currencies:$16; €12

- - EARLY BIRD KNIGHT EDITION - -  
==============================
Same rewards as the KNIGHT EDITION
==============================
Est. other currencies:$32; €24

- - - - - - - - KNIGHT Edition - - - - - - - - 
==============================
1 Digital Dukes of War Soundtrack composed by Jonathan vd Wijngaarden + 1 Digital colored artbook + 1000 ingame Gold + KNIGHT Forum Badge + All above tier rewards
==============================
Est. other currencies:$49; €36

- - - - - - - - BARON Edition - - - - - - - - 
==============================
1 Additional special Hero in the game + 1 Digital colored hint book! + Second download of the full game for YOU, your Family or a Friend! + BARON  Forum Badge + All above tier rewards
==============================
Est. other currencies:$74; €54

- - - - - - - - COUNT Edition - - - - - - - -  
==============================
1 Physical Dukes of War Soundtrack (CD) + 1 Printed color artbook = all packaged in a uniquely designed Dukes Of War Box + COUNT Forum Badge + All above tier rewards
==============================
Est. other currencies:$115; €85

- - - - - - PRINCE Edition - - - - - -
==============================
A special Dukes Of War Backers T-shirt + 1 Dukes of War Poster (Knight, Barbarian or Prince Desmon) + Early access to the 3rd Duke with 24 new Units and 4 new heroes in the game (available on release) + All upcoming DLC's! + PRINCE Forum Badge + All above tier rewards
==============================
Est. other currencies:$215; €157

- - - - - - - KING Edition - - - - - - -
==============================
Become part of the game and help us create a complete new Duke with all new units and a whole new Island (incl.8 Level)! + KING Forum Badge + All above tier rewards
==============================
Est. other currencies:$413; €303

- - - - - - EMPEROR Edition - - - - - -
==============================
YOU as a Duke including voice-over in the game!  Recording will be done in a professional studio located in Berlin-Germany incl. accommodation in Berlin (own travel!) + EMPORER Forum Badge + All above tier rewards - EXCEPT the KING Edition!
==============================
Est. other currencies:$1.645; €1.200

- - - - - DUKES of WAR Edition - - - - -
==============================  A unique ca. 1,20m high, full colored and special designed Dukes of War Statue of your choice (Knight, Barbarian or Prince Desmon)! + DUKES of WAR Forum Badge + All above tier rewards - EXCEPT the KING and EMPEROR Edition!
==============================
Est. other currencies: $8.200; €6.050
